snippet.title: Penrose Game Trailer (Playdate)
snippet.description:
In the town of Penrose, nothing is as it seems.

Face eldritch giants, encounter sentient malls, explore hidden catacombs, and piece together who you were, are, and want to be.

Dropping 10/1/22 for Playdate, with the option to also play on PC, Mac, and Linux.

https://whyfie.itch.io/penrose
